patients.name: Helen M.
patients.quote: The focus on APOE4 makes me feel like I'm understood, after years of feeling like we were an afterthought in Alzheimer's research.

patients.name: William P.
patients.quote: While my husband had to stop taking lecanemab during his MCI stage because of side effects, reading the data from their research is giving me hope for our future.

patients.name: Katherine R.
patients.quote: After all the failures of different studies in the past few years for our Alzheimer’s community, honestly, I’m thrilled to read about anything that’s moving forward to a next phase.
